# com.apple.smoot.subscriptionservice

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether your app meets the requirements of the video-partner program.

## Discussion

This entitlement enables you to use the required APIs for the Apple TV App and Universal Search.

For more information and to request the entitlement, see the [https://developer.apple.com/programs/video-partner].

## TV

- **User Management Entitlement**: The entitlement for distinguishing between multiple user accounts on Apple TV.
- **com.apple.developer.video-subscriber-single-sign-on**: A Boolean value that indicates whether your app can use the TV Provider Authentication service.
